div.div: Accumulated yield decrease from the current level to the periods from the 2010 s to 2090 s in the forecast cases (non-forecast, 10-yr-forecast, and 20-yr-forecast cases) in the nine countries under the RCP8.5 scenario.
div.p: The values are shown as relative to those in the timely case. The bar charts and the error bars are the averages and ranges of all the results based on different climate projections, respectively.
